comments.body: Do you have a bug to get rid of this entirely? It's against where add-ons are headed, and definitely doesn't work with any existing add-on upgrade mechanics. It's closer to where add-ons started when I first filed #3579.

In the current state the whole docker-compose setup for k8sm is for fire-and-forget test clusters. Upgrades of addons doesn't play a role here (yet). I would prefer to defer any change to this part to a later PR. I have added a ticket: https://github.com/mesosphere/kubernetes-mesos/issues/424
